description: Eventually, http://anidb.net/ch93275 [Mao] manages to build a raft and ends up in China, where she studies kung-fu while subtly using her powers to rise near the top of the school. There she meets http://anidb.net/ch95481 [Atsushi] 3 years later who tells her about http://anidb.net/ch93274 [Hina]`s whereabouts.
name: Mao
